text: The Knockout is a lost The Library of Congress/FIAF American Silent Feature Film Survival Catalog:..The Knockout 1925 silent film drama directed by Lambert Hillyer and starring Milton Sills. It was based on a novel The Come- Back by Morris DeCamp Crawford. It was produced by and released by First National Pictures. The Knockout at silentera.com The AFI Catalog of Feature Films:..The Knockout ==Cast== *Milton Sills - Sandy Donlin *Lorna Duveen - Jean Farot *JohnPhilip Kolb - Black Jack Ducane *Edward Lawrence - Mike Leary *Harry Cording - Steve McKenna *Frankie Evans - Brown *Harlan Knight - Farot *Jed Prouty - Mac *Claude King - Parker ==Preservation status== *The film is now lost. Just a trailer survives in the Library of Congress collection.Catalog of Holdings The American Film Institute Collection and The United Artists Collection at The Library of Congress, (<-book title) [trailer only] p.98 c.1978 the American Film Institute ==References== ==External links== *The Knockout at IMDb.com * Category:1925 films Category:American silent feature films Category:Lost American films Category:Films based on American novels Category:Films directed by Lambert Hillyer Category:First National Pictures films Category:American films Category:American black-and- white films Category:1925 drama films Category:American drama films
title: The Knockout (1925 film)
